titles: Act containing the tenour of the band for securing the peace of the kingdom.
author: Scotland. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,
notes: Appointing a form of declaration to be signed by suspected persons acknowledging the authority of the Parliament of 4 Jan. 1649, and promising not to oppose it, assist its enemies, or conceal plots against it, or break the union with England. Noblemen to find caution for 100,000 marks, barons 50,000, etc. -- Cf. Steele.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 20 1648"; 9 in imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
